channel.title: How ill make premium plac
channel.description:
How ill make member places? like that legends guild there will only get members how ill make that tele command? like ::premiumspot and there can tele only premium member ppl can you help me find the command? thx!
sorry about my english im Estonian

item.title: How ill make premium plac
item.dc:creator: @ilovedestiny ilovedestiny
item.description:
@ilovedestiny wrote:

[quote=“darkgirl861, post:2, topic:253474”]TAKE NO CREDS FOR DA COMMAND THING

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“MemberZone”) && playerRights > 1)
{
teleportToX = X;//Modify it how you see fit
teleportToY = Y;//Modify it how you see fit
sendMessage(“You teleport to the Memeber Zone.”);
}

ok change the x & y cords to were you want the place to be and you can chage the des :You teleport to the Memeber Zone.: also player rights is what ever right the members are or w.e you want it to be[/quote]

where it says && player rights = 1 make it and VIP = 1 and create a vip slot in ur player.class

Read full topic

item.title: How ill make premium plac
item.dc:creator: @vinku12 vinku12
item.description:
@vinku12 wrote:

[quote="`MOAD, post:6, topic:253474"]You could use a boolean for premium members.

public boolean prem() { if(playerIsMember > 1) { return true; } else { return false; } }

For your command something like

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("premzone") && prem()) { teleportToX = X;//Modify this as you see fit teleportToY = Y;//Modify this as you see fit sendMessage("You teleport to the Premium area."); }

@dark, you copied that from my post where I helped him make teleporting commands.[/quote]

lol mhm… cant understand maibe explain…? soz[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2008, 09:00:50 pm[/size][hr]how ill do that… lol

Read full topic

item.title: How ill make premium plac
item.dc:creator: @_MOAD `MOAD
item.description:
@_MOAD wrote:

You could use a boolean for premium members.

public boolean prem() { if(playerIsMember > 1) { return true; } else { return false; } }

For your command something like

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("premzone") && prem()) { teleportToX = X;//Modify this as you see fit teleportToY = Y;//Modify this as you see fit sendMessage("You teleport to the Premium area."); }

@dark, you copied that from my post where I helped him make teleporting commands.

Read full topic

item.description:
@darkgirl861 wrote:

0 = members
1 = mods
2 = admins
3 = owner

not inless your sorce/server is diff and theres extra right such as staff or w.e

item.title: How ill make premium plac
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

This will probably sound complicated, but really it’s not. I can’t hand it all to you because that is spoon-feeding.

  1. Declare an int

2.Make a command or method that checks if the int is 1, and if it is then it will let you go through. Then using an else statement, you can make it so if it is 0 then it won’t work.

You will also need to make something that adds to the variable, such as

case #: variable += 1; break;

That’s for members. If you want a staff zone, you should use that guy’s code.

Read full topic
